Table.Name: pQuoteFolder
Table.FormSQL: SELECT dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteFolderID, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteFolderNo, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteFolderType, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteStartDate, fnx_FORMAT_date_simple(dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteDueDate), dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteFolderStatus, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteGroupCost, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteCustomField1, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteCustomField2, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteCustomField3, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteCustomField4, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteCustomField5, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteCustomField6, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteCustomField7, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteCustomField8, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteCustomField9, dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteCustomField10, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.StyleID, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.TeamID, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.QuoteFolderItemStatus, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.TradePartner, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.EstimatedCostType, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.EstimatedCost, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.EstimatedCostCur, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.VendorCostType, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.VendorCost, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.VendorCostCur, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.FinalCostType, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.FinalCost, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.FinalCostCur, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField1, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField2, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField3, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField4, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField5, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField6, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField7, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField8, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField9, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField10, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField11, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField12, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField13, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField14, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CustomField15, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CUser, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.CDate, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.MUser, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.MDate, dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.QuoteFolderTeamID, dbo.Users.CompanyFROM dbo.pQuoteFolder INNER JOINdbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam ON dbo.pQuoteFolder.QuoteFolderID = dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.QuoteFolderID INNER JOINdbo.Users ON dbo.pQuoteFolderItemTeam.TeamID = dbo.Users.TeamID

column.Name: QuoteFolderType
column.lookupquery: SELECT QuoteType, QuoteType AS QuoteTypeName FROM pQuoteFolderType ORDER BY QuoteFolderOrder

column.Name: QuoteCustomField5
column.lookupquery: SELECT SourceID, Source FROM pSource ORDER BY SourceID

column.Name: QuoteCustomField6
